thread.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger knocks Trump's approval rating

author: USA TODAY
title: Arnold Schwarzenegger knocks Trump's approval rating
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Arnold Schwarzenegger knocks Trump's approval rating After a Gallup poll found that President Trump's approval rating had hit a new low of 37% last week, Schwarzenegger on Tuesday tweeted out a video with his thoughts on the matter. Post to Facebook Arnold Schwarzenegger knocks Trump's approval rating After a Gallup poll found that President Trump's approval rating had hit a new low of 37% last week, Schwarzenegger on Tuesday tweeted out a video with his thoughts on the matter. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/2nwJwn0 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address.   Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Arnold Schwarzenegger knocks Trump's approval rating Jessica Estepa , USA TODAY 10:54 a.m. ET March 21, 2017 
Arnold Schwarzenegger speaks on stage prior to the Arnold Family Walk as part of the 2017 Arnold Classic on March 19, 2017 in Melbourne, Australia. (Photo: Robert Cianflone, Getty Images) 
The Arnold Schwarzenegger-Donald Trump feud continues. 
After a Gallup poll found that President Trump's approval rating had hit a new low of 37% last week, Schwarzenegger on Tuesday tweeted out a video with his thoughts on the matter: 
Oh, Donald. The ratings are in, and you got swamped. Wow. Now you're in the 30s? But what do you expect? When you take away after-school programs for children, Meals on Wheels for the poor people, that's not what you call making America great again. C'mon! I mean, who is advising you? 
Schwarzenegger then offered some advice: Go visit Hart Middle School in Washington, D.C., to see the "fantastic work" being done for children. He even offered to take Trump himself. Hey, @realDonaldTrump , I have some advice. See you at Hart Middle School? Here's more info about #afterschool : https://t.co/NOgdhBHyyp pic.twitter.com/NQI2OdVqtF 
Schwarzenegger's knock on Trump's ratings come after the president criticized Schwarzenegger for his host stint on The New Celebrity Apprentice . Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2nwJwn0 Most Popular
